Julia Ernst

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Wade Trevett
  3. Location of Family: Reamsville, KS
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 11
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: female
  9. Notes: Franklin City News says placed with A. T. Mead instead of Wade Trevett.
  10. Source: OTR 609; Franklin City News, 28 June 1913.
